questions.explanation: Solana has a total value locked (TVL) between $5B and $10B, ranking it 2nd among DeFi platforms, and supports 329 different protocols. Its native token is SOL.

questions.prompt: Which chain has higher TVL: Solana or Base?
questions.explanation: Solana has a total value locked (TVL) of $8.7B, which is 49.2% higher than Base's TVL of $4.4B. This indicates that Solana has significantly more assets deposited in its protocol compared to Base.

questions.prompt: In what month did Solana hit its all-time high TVL?
questions.explanation: Solana reached its all-time high (ATH) total value locked (TVL) of $13.2B in September 2025. This figure represents the peak amount of assets deposited in the Solana protocol.

questions.prompt: Which protocol has the most TVL on Solana?
questions.explanation: On the Solana blockchain, the top protocol by total value locked (TVL) is Binance CEX, with a TVL of $165.0B. Other notable protocols include Lido at $26.2B, OKX at $22.7B, and Bitfinex at $19.7B.

questions.prompt: Which DEX is #1 by 24h volume on Solana?
questions.explanation: On the Solana blockchain, HumidiFi is the top decentralized exchange (DEX) with a trading volume of $1.2B, significantly higher than its closest competitors, PumpSwap at $371M and Raydium AMM at $366M. This large volume indicates HumidiFi's leading position in the Solana DEX ecosystem.
